page.title: 14Mr Malkin
page.content: Mr Malkin is a well known Cheadle citizen.As an ex-Mayor he was once classed as the first citizen of the town.He had to attend Public Functions in the town and as one of the 21 local councillors he is still responsible for the welfare of the town.He is the Chairman of Governors of Saint Giles R.C.Primary School & he has to chair the Meetings at which the policy of the School is decided. He has to interview Teachers for Teaching Posts & he helps to ensure that the School is kept in a good state of repair.Before he retired he was an electrician.He has many interests.He loves Music & he was once a Band Leader & accordian player.He plays the Church organ as well as being a railway enthusiast & stamp collector.
